bcbioRnaseq
  • Reference

Quality control metrics plots

These functions are a collection of gene-level quality control plots.

plot_total_reads(bcb, pass_limit = 20L, warn_limit = 10L,
  interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_mapped_reads(bcb, pass_limit = 20L, warn_limit = 10L,
  interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_mapping_rate(bcb, pass_limit = 90L, warn_limit = 70L,
  interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_genes_detected(bcb, pass_limit = 20000L, interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_gene_detection_saturation(bcb, interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_exonic_mapping_rate(bcb, pass_limit = 60L, interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_intronic_mapping_rate(bcb, warn_limit = 20L, interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_rrna_mapping_rate(bcb, warn_limit = 10L, interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_counts_per_gene(bcb, normalized = "tmm", interesting_groups = NULL)

plot_count_density(bcb, normalized = "tmm")

Arguments

bcb

bcbioRNADataSet.
pass_limit

Threshold to plot pass color marker.
warn_limit

Threshold to plot warning color marker.
interesting_groups

(Optional). Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
normalized

Count normalization method. See counts() documentation for more information.

Value

ggplot.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value

Author

Michael Steinbaugh, Rory Kirchner, Victor Barrera

Developed by Michael J. Steinbaugh, Rory Kirchner, Lorena Pantano, Victor Barrera, Harvard Chan Bioinformatics Core.
